text: Main entrance Lycée Paul Valéry (LPV) is a French international school in Meknès, Morocco. It serves levels maternelle (preschool) through lycée (senior high school)."Inscriptions-Réinscriptions" (Archive). Lycée Paul Valéry. Retrieved on March 24, 2015. "BP S-34, Bd Moulay Youssef 50 000 Meknès - Maroc " It is named after the French poet Paul Valéry."Historique" (Archive). Lycée Paul Valéry. Retrieved on March 24, 2015. It was originally established as the École française de Meknès in 1914. Its current building opened in a former barracks in 1962, and the school received its current name that year. The campus has over of space.Home page (Archive). Lycée Paul Valéry. Retrieved on March 24, 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Lycée Paul Valéry Category:French international schools in Morocco Category:Meknes Category:Educational institutions established in 1914
title: Lycée Paul Valéry (Morocco)
